body_html:
Here is the results of running: 'locate libTH.so.1'
/home/yuhang/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libTH.so.1
/home/yuhang/anaconda2/pkgs/pytorch-0.1.9-py27_2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libTH.so.1

I previously have Pytorch installed. I upgrade my CUDA and CuDNN. I first tried to install the Pytorch again from conda, got a torch ._C error, then I decide to install it from source. I got this error.

Do I need to remove 'pytorch-0.1.9-py27_2‘　?
@soumith
